title: Bach - The Complete Organ Works - Hans Fagius (Part 2 of 2)
description:
Music : Classical : Lossless




Hans Fagius, organ
Instrument: The reconstructed baroque organ in Kristine Church, Falun (Sweden)
Recording: 1983-1989




Between 1983 and 1989, the Swedish virtuoso organist and teacher Hans Fagius recorded the complete organ works of J. S. Bach for a distinguished Swedish CD label. 

A review in The American Organist ranked Fagius as the best integral set of recordings. 

The set includes all of the undisputed works (including the Neumeister Chorales) as well as the 8 Little Preludes & Fugues.

More about Hans Fagius: http://www.bach-cantatas.com/Bio/Fagius-Hans.htm

The Collection consists of two parts: Part I - 8 CD's, 2.10 GB, and Part II - 9 CD's, 2.70 GB. 




Enjoy and Seed!
